1.name: Dark Passage
1.description: A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a woman to try and prove his innocence.

2.name: Out of the Past
2.description: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses and duplicitous dames.

3.name: Crossfire
3.description: A man is murdered, apparently by one of a group of demobilized soldiers he met in a bar. But which one? And why?

4.name: Black Narcissus
4.description: After opening a convent in the Himalayas, five nuns encounter conflict and tension - both with the natives and also within their own group - as they attempt to adapt to their remote, exotic surroundings.

5.name: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
5.description: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted...and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

6.name: Miracle on 34th Street
6.description: When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.

7.name: The Lady from Shanghai
7.description: Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.

8.name: Gentleman's Agreement
8.description: A reporter pretends to be Jewish in order to cover a story on anti-Semitism, and personally discovers the true depths of bigotry and hatred.

9.name: The Bishop's Wife
9.description: An angel in human form enters the life of a bishop in order to help him build a new cathedral and repair his fractured marriage.

10.name: Lured
10.description: A serial killer in London is murdering young women he meets through the personal columns of newspapers. He announces each of his murders to the police by sending them a cryptic poem. After ...                See full summary »

11.name: The Paradine Case
11.description: A happily married London barrister falls in love with the accused poisoner he is defending.

12.name: Brute Force
12.description: At a tough penitentiary, prisoner Joe Collins plans to rebel against Captain Munsey, the power-mad chief guard.

13.name: Monsieur Verdoux
13.description: A suave but cynical man supports his family by marrying and murdering rich women for their money, but the job has some occupational hazards.

14.name: Angel and the Badman
14.description: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

15.name: Kiss of Death
15.description: With his law-breaking lifestyle in the past, an ex-con, along with his family, attempt to start a new life, knowing a betrayed someone from the past is bound to see otherwise.

16.name: Unconquered
16.description: Intrepid frontiersman Chris Holden foils the political and personal ambitions of renegade Martin Garth in the Ohio Valley following the French and Indian War.

17.name: Dead Reckoning
17.description: A soldier runs away rather than receive the Medal of Honor, so his buddy gets permission to investigate, and love and death soon follow.

18.name: New Orleans
18.description: A gambling hall owner relocates from New Orleans to Chicago and entertains his patrons with hot jazz by Louis Armstrong, Billie Holiday, Woody Herman, and others.

19.name: The Two Mrs. Carrolls
19.description: An artist forms an attachment with a woman on holiday in the country. As the relationship develops, his behavior and information about his past cause her increasing concern.

20.name: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
20.description: A clumsy daydreamer gets caught up in a sinister conspiracy.

21.name: Nightmare Alley
21.description: The rise and fall of Stanton Carlisle, a mentalist whose lies and deceit prove to be his downfall.

22.name: Life with Father
22.description: A financier from New York rules his numerous family, consisting of his wife and his four sons, with the meticulousness of a bookkeeper.

23.name: Odd Man Out
23.description: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

24.name: Holiday Camp
24.description: The Huggett family go to a holiday camp, and get involved in crooked card players, a murderer on the run, and a pregnant young girl and her boyfriend missing from home.

25.name: Fun & Fancy Free
25.description: Jiminy Cricket hosts two Disney animated shorts: "Bongo," about a circus bear escaping to the wild, and "Mickey and the Beanstalk," a take on the famous fairy tale.

26.name: The Farmer's Daughter
26.description: After leaving her family's farm to study nursing in the city, a young woman finds herself on an unexpected path towards politics.

27.name: The Red House
27.description: An old man and his sister are concealing a terrible secret from their adopted teen daughter, concerning a hidden abandoned farmhouse, located deep in the woods.

28.name: Forever Amber
28.description: In seventeenth-century England, Amber St. Clair aims to raise herself from country girl to nobility, and succeeds, but loses her true love in the process.

29.name: The Bachelor and the Bobby-Soxer
29.description: A high school girl falls for a playboy artist, with screwball results.

30.name: The Foxes of Harrow
30.description: In the pre-Civil War New Orleans, roguish Irish gambler Stephen Fox (Rex Harrison) buys his way into society, something he couldn't do in his homeland because he is illegitimate.

31.name: My Favorite Brunette
31.description: Shortly before his execution on the death row in San Quentin, amateur sleuth and baby photographer Ronnie Jackson, tells reporters how he got there.

32.name: I Walk Alone
32.description: Frankie Madison leaves prison expecting a share from his ex-partner. But Prohibition bootlegging didn't prepare Frankie for Big Business.

33.name: A Double Life
33.description: Anthony John is an actor whose life is strongly influenced by the characters he plays. When he's playing comedy, he's the most enjoyable person in the world, but when he's playing drama, ...                See full summary »

34.name: Possessed
34.description: After being found wandering the streets of Los Angeles, a severely catatonic woman tells a doctor the complex story of how she wound up there.

35.name: The Sea of Grass
35.description: On America's frontier, a St. Louis woman marries a New Mexico cattleman who is seen as a tyrant by the locals.

36.name: Backlash
36.description: A man tries to frame his wife for a murder that he has committed.

37.name: Boomerang!
37.description: The true story of a prosecutor's fight to prove the innocence of a man accused of a notorious murder.

38.name: Body and Soul
38.description: A talented boxer's young career hits difficult terrain when an unethical promoter takes interest in him.

39.name: Song of the Thin Man
39.description: Nick and Nora investigate the murder of a bandleader in New York.

40.name: Pursued
40.description: A boy haunted by nightmares about the night his entire family was murdered is brought up by a neighboring family in the 1880s. He falls for his lovely adoptive sister but his nasty adoptive brother and mysterious uncle want him dead.

41.name: The Egg and I
41.description: On their wedding night, Bob reveals to Betty that he has purchased an abandoned chicken farm. Betty struggles to adapt to their new rural lifestyle, especially when a glamorous neighbor seems to set her eyes on Bob.

42.name: Secret Beyond the Door...
42.description: When a lovely woman and her new husband settle in an ancient mansion on the East coast, she discovers that he may want to kill her.

43.name: It Happened on Fifth Avenue
43.description: A homeless New Yorker moves into a mansion and along the way he gathers friends to live in the house with him. Before he knows it, he is living with the actual home owners.

44.name: The Fugitive
44.description: Anti-Catholic and anti-cleric policies in the Mexican state of Tabasco lead the revolutionary government to persecute the state's last remaining priest.

45.name: Born to Kill
45.description: A calculating divorcée risks her chances at wealth and security with a man she doesn't love by getting involved with the hotheaded murderer romancing her foster sister.

46.name: Dishonored Lady
46.description: Madeleine Damien is the fashion editor of a slick Manhattan magazine by day and a lively party girl by night. Unfortunately, the pressures of her job, including kowtowing to a hefty ...                See full summary »

47.name: It Happened in Brooklyn
47.description: Danny has been in the army for 4 years, yet all he thinks about is Brooklyn and how great it is. When he returns after the war, he soon finds that Brooklyn is not so nice after all. He is ...                See full summary »

48.name: Sinbad, the Sailor
48.description: In medieval Persia, during the rule of Caliph Harun-Al-Rashid, Sinbad the Sailor boasts about his latest adventures to his friends.

49.name: It Always Rains on Sunday
49.description: An escaped convict tries to hide out at his former lover's house, but she has since married and is reluctant to help him.

50.name: The Unsuspected
50.description: The secretary of an affably suave radio mystery host mysteriously commits suicide after his wealthy young niece disappears.
